title: Service Fabric Explorer Repository
body:
Service Fabric Explorer repository: https://github.com/microsoft/service-fabric-explorer

Web-based management tool for Azure Service Fabric clusters providing:
- Cluster topology visualization
- Application and service monitoring
- Node health and status
- Backup/restore service management
- Event store viewer with timeline
- Upgrade tracking and management

Service Fabric Explorer is the primary UI tool for cluster administration and troubleshooting. Use this repository for SFX issues and feature requests.
